details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.3 Version identification - Conformance level.
details.description: A file that does not conform to either PDF/A-4e or PDF/A-4f shall not provide any "pdfaid:conformance"

rule.description: A file that does not conform to either PDF/A-4e or PDF/A-4f shall not provide any "pdfaid:conformance"

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of null for PDF/A-4 conforming file
